title: Quick Fix
description:
Alice Paige, Aaron Wolfe and Adriane Jankovic share stories about unlikely dominatrixes, unsuccessful peacekeepers, and a Mr. Right who wasn't.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Beastie Boys, Aaron Wolfe, Blitzen Trapper, Art of Noise, Adriane Jankovic, the Dap-Kings, Sharon Jones, Jeff Barr, The Klezmer, Kevin Allison, Alice Paige)
